parameters.name: AcceleratorIds
parameters.description:
The ID of the GA instance.

You can enter up to 50 IDs.

parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description:
The accelerated domain name to be added.

Wildcard domain names are supported. A wildcard domain name must start with `*.`, such as `*.example.com`.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the GA instance is deployed. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.
